Goodhart's Law (of AI) (permalink) One way to think about AI's unwelcome intrusion into our lives can be summed up with Godhardt's Law: "When a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure": https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goodhart%27s_law Goodhart's Law is a harsh mistress. It's incredibly exciting to discover a new way of measuring aspects of a complex system in a way that lets you understand (and thus control) it.
